_header: Gaza is a noble town in a far country
Subjects: Hilarion, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Illarion, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Gaza is a nobble toun In verre contreIn þe lond of spayne hit
                    is so men hit telleþ me…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we god for þe loue of seint illarionÞat
                    he vs graunty þat blis þat ending naueþ non
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 333-6.
